articles.title: Star Wars: Rogue One writer reveals role in Square Enix’s Project Athia - Digital Trends
articles.description: Gary Whitta, one of the writers of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, confirmed his involvement in the development of the mysterious Project Athia by Square Enix.
articles.content:
One of the writers behind the 2016 film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story has confirmed his involvement in Square Enix’s mysterious Project Athia, which is set to launch on the PlayStation 5 and PC.
